channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Store Inventory Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Retail Store Inventory Management

item.title: CVE-2019-2880|2024-09-30T14:50:13.608Z -- oracle%20corporation -- retail%20store%20inventory%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Retail Store Inventory Management product of Oracle Retail Applications (component: Security). The supported version that is affected is 16.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Retail Store Inventory Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in takeover of Oracle Retail Store Inventory Management. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 8.8 (Confidentiality, Integrity and Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
